risks.title: No Guaranteed Compensation
risks.description: The compensation is entirely commission-based, with no guaranteed base pay.
risks.recommendation: Negotiate for a minimum base salary or guaranteed minimum compensation

risks.title: Immediate Termination Without Notice
risks.description: The contract allows for immediate termination without notice for various reasons.
risks.recommendation: Negotiate for a notice period or severance pay upon termination without cause

risks.title: Broad IP Assignment
risks.description: All work product and intellectual property is assigned to the company, with no exclusions.
risks.recommendation: Negotiate for exclusions for pre-existing work and personal projects

risks.title: Broad Non-Compete
risks.description: The non-compete clause has no geographic or business scope limitations.
risks.recommendation: Negotiate to limit the non-compete to specific geographic regions and business activities

risks.title: Perpetual Confidentiality Obligation
risks.description: The confidentiality obligation has no time limit, extending indefinitely.
risks.recommendation: Negotiate for a reasonable time limit on confidentiality obligations

risks.title: Open-Ended Indemnification
risks.description: The indemnification clause has no limitations or exclusions.
risks.recommendation: Negotiate for reasonable limitations and exclusions on indemnification obligations
